DOC.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Patients Using the Subretinal Retina Implant Alpha
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a non-invasive registry to monitor the safety and efficacy of patients using the CE-certified RETINA IMPLANT Alpha. For Germany, it is under the exceptions mentioned in ยง23b MPG (Medizinproduktegesetz). Its purpose is to collect data that is created during the regular therapy with the implant. No additional examinations are performed, except a patient questionnaire.
DOC.criteria: All patients receiving a Retina Implant Alpha at the study site.
